content: free pattern @allfromjade no-sew squishy fish before you start materials notes two colors of #6 bulky yarn i used the yarn under/over weight you can use any yarn for technique for this pattern but this this project is not mandatory suggested yarns parfait chunky work in a spiral do not join honey bunny baby snuggle rounds or turn your work himalayan dolphin paintbox use a stitch marker or a piece of chenille etc yarn to mark the beginning of a 4mm crochet hook round move the marker up after 10mm safety eyes completing each round polyester fiberfill for stuffing abbreviations yarn needle scissors stitch markers double_crochet = double_crochet stitch optional strand of pink yarn for decrease = invisible decrease the cheeks flo = crochet in the front loop only copyrights half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet stitch copyright © 2024 all from jade increase = increase - make 2 single do not copy reproduce modify crochet in the same stitch publish or distribute this pattern inc3 = make 3 single_crochet in the in any way you may sell finished same stitch products made with this pattern magic_ring = magic_ring credit/tag me as the designer single_crochet = single_crochet stitch slip_stitch s = slip_stitch es difficulty advanced beginner @allfromjade fish start with main color mc r1 magic_ring of 5 single_crochet 5 swipe at the end for r2 5 single_crochet 5 step pictures r3 inc3 x5 15 r4 1 single_crochet 1 increase x7 1 single_crochet 22 r5 22 single_crochet 22 you will change for contrasting color cc in r6 make all the stitches underlined in contrasting color r6 6 single_crochet mc | 6 single_crochet 2 decrease 6 single_crochet cc 20 r7 all in mc 7 single_crochet fin 10 single_crochet fin 1 single_crochet 20 counting fin as 1 st fin image 1 = flo 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 single_crochet all in the same stitch r8 images 2-3 7 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in the back loop unused 10 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in the back loop unused 1 single_crochet 20 secure the eyes between rnds 3-4 in line with the fins r9 with color changes 6 single_crochet mc | 5 single_crochet 2 decrease 5 single_crochet cc 18 r10 all in mc 4 single_crochet 1 decrease x3 15 r11 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x5 10 stuff r12 3 single_crochet 1 decrease x2 8 and make 2 extra single_crochet to reach the bottom of the body r13 will be made crocheting both sides together image 4 r13 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet chain 1 in same st 1 single_crochet in next chain 1 1 double_crochet in next chain 2 1 slip_stitch in last fasten_off and weave in the yarn tail @allfromjade dorsal fin swipe at the end for step pictures with main color join a new strand of yarn in a stitch of r10 above the back fin insert hook and pull up a loop image 5 1 always picking up the next stitch towards the nose straight in line at the top of the
